snippet.title: Binaries Launch Trailer April 2016
snippet.description:
Binaries is a tricky platformer with unique dual-character gameplay. 
Available now on Windows, Mac and Linux, and coming soon to PlayStation 4 & Xbox One.
http://store.steampowered.com/app/435800/
http://www.PlayBinaries.com


Test your reflexes and awareness as you simultaneously guide two lovable[1] balls through a series of brightly coloured challenges in the world's first[2] concentration platform game.

Control both at the same time using the same set of controls - when one moves left so does the other - and watch out for hazards colour matching the little tykes.

Oh, and there are jokes.[3]

[1]May not be lovable
[2]May not be first
[3]May not be funny
